result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
3:06 PM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: Yates. Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin in court with Jordan Thomas Cusick.  Attorney Karl E Anderson in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Anderson advises possible agreement. Atty Perrin waives prelim; not guilty plea for upcoming amended charges, no speedy trial demand. Court confirms address. Court advises of rights and possible penalties regarding a preliminary hearing.  Court finds DF has freely, voluntarily, and knowingly waived the right to a preliminary hearing, finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Adjourned: 3:10 p.m.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on December 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 26, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
for Continuance of PH on 09/13/22. Filed by DA Anderson. arc   to bk.
NOH (PH) returned by PO. Return to sender. Attempted - not known. Unable to forward. olg
Preliminary hearing on September 13, 2022 at 11:00 am.

11:20 AM DE appeared for 7/14/22 via Zoom and Court advised hearing was rescheduled at the request of the PD's Office. Court confirms DE's address and phone number. Court will allow DE to appear by Zoom at next hearing.  gll
to reschedule 07/14/22 STC. Filed by PD Ann P. arc     Per EFV on 7-12-2022: "Okay to reschedule" JA will reset w/ Attys. arc
filed by Travis Satorius; hereby appointing Atty Perrin. arc

ADDRESS INFO for Jordan Thomas Cusick
Current: 267 Front Ave Apt 2, Saint Paul, MN 55117 United States  (Effective: 07-05-2022)
Prior: 10701 Larkey Road, Hinckley, MN 55037

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant. 

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Fleet Farm in Hudson, WI.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:57 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Karl E Anderson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jordan Thomas Cusick in court. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant qualifies for PD. Bond argument; bond ordered. Waive speedy prelim. Court sets STC via Zoom to check on status of atty and to schedule prelim. Adjourned at 2:02 PM.  gll
